comment:
* Logging for android.view.textclassifier package. *

* To enable full log: * 1. adb shell setprop log.tag.androidtc VERBOSE * 2. adb shell stop && adb shell start * * @hide

variables.name: ENABLE_FULL_LOGGING
variables.comment:
* true: Enables full logging.
     * false: Limits logging to debug level.

methods.name: public static void v(String tag, String msg)
public static void d(String tag, String msg)
public static void w(String tag, String msg)
public static void e(String tag, String msg, Throwable tr)

methodNames: public static void v(String tag, String msg)
public static void d(String tag, String msg)
public static void w(String tag, String msg)
public static void e(String tag, String msg, Throwable tr)
